settings.name: Whitelist
settings.comment: Comma-Separated list of block codes to allow for selection, overruling filters. Leave empty to allow all blocks that pass the other filters.

settings.name: Blacklist
settings.comment: Comma-Separated list of block codes to disallow for selection, overruling filters.

settings.name: AllowFood
settings.comment: If enabled, food items (pies, cheese) can be selected.

settings.name: AllowPlants
settings.comment: If enabled, saplings and flowers can be selected.

settings.name: AllowBlockEntities
settings.comment: If enabled, chests, signs, and machines can be selected.

settings.name: AllowLiquids
settings.comment: If enabled, liquid blocks can be selected.

settings.name: AllowClay
settings.comment: If enabled, raw clay, bowls, crocks, and planters can be selected.
